common.sd
Interface SocketData

All Known Implementing Classes:
SD_AdminAdd, SD_Channel, SD_Chat, SD_Error, SD_Kick, SD_Log, SD_Private, SD_Rename, SD_ServerCap, SD_UserAdd, SD_UserDel, SD_Whisper
public interface SocketData

Interface to represent data to be transfered over a socket. Any data that needs to be sent over the socket must implement this method and Serializable so it can be serialized and sent over the socket

Version:
0.8
Author:
Joseph Monti countjoe@users.sourceforge.net

Method Summary
 void performAction(common.SocketConnection sc)
          This method is what calls the aproprate functions on the recieving end of the socket
